Aggregates, cement and ready-mix concrete market investigation

Date of referral: 18.01.12 Statutory deadline: 17.01.14

Email: aggregates@cc.gsi.gov.uk       RSS Feed

Core documents

  • Terms of reference (PDF, 13 Kb)  (18.01.12)
  • Inquiry Group: Professor Martin Cave (Chairman of the Group), Roger Davis, Phil Evans, Professor Thomas Hoehn, Malcolm Nicholson
  • Disclosures of interest (PDF, 34 Kb) 
  • Administrative timetable (PDF, 27 Kb)  
  • Issues statement (PDF, 86 Kb)  (08.03.12)
  • Updated Issues statement (PDF, 327 Kb)  (26.11.12)
  • Notice of possible remedies (PDF, 170 Kb)  (21.05.13)
  • Notice of provisional findings (PDF, 44 Kb)  (21.05.13)
  • Summary of provisional findings report (PDF, 109 Kb)  (21.05.13)
  • Provisional findings report (23.05.13 addendum published 08.10.13)
  • Notice of addendum to provisional findings (PDF, 41 Kb)  (08.10.13)
  • Addendum to provisional findings (PDF, 614 Kb)  (08.10.13)
  • Summary of provisional decision on remedies (PDF, 117 Kb)  (08.10.13)
  • Provisional decision on remedies (PDF, 1.4 Mb)  and Appendices (PDF, 6.2 Mb)  (10.10.13) 
  • Final report (14.01.14)
  • Administrative timetable for remedy implementation (PDF, 23 Kb)  (24.01.14)
